name: Wait I was there two seconds ago
name_original: Wait I was there two seconds ago
description:
Controls  :

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump - Spacebar

Run - Left Shift

Interact - E or Z

Restart - R

Pause - Esc

Wait I Was There Two Seconds Ago is a speedrunning game, where you replay the same level over and over, but with a different twist each time! 

The game contains 20 unique levels.

Try your best to beat your best time! You can share your record down in the discussion board.

Are you going to be able to beat the devs' best time?


This game was made entirely within a time span of two days for Brakeys Game Jam 2023.1 , by a team of 4!
